fields.name: No poverty
fields.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

fields.name: Zero hunger
fields.description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

fields.name: Good health and well being
fields.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

fields.name: Quality education
fields.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

fields.name: Gender equality
fields.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

fields.name: Clean water and sanitation
fields.description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

fields.name: Affordable and clean energy
fields.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

fields.name: Decent work and economic growth
fields.description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

fields.name: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
fields.description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

fields.name: Reduced Inequalities
fields.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries

fields.name: Sustainable cities and communities
fields.description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

fields.name: Responsible consumption and production
fields.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

fields.name: Climate action
fields.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

fields.name: Life below water
fields.description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

fields.name: Life on land
fields.description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

fields.name: Peace, justice and strong institutions
fields.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

fields.name: Partnerships for the goals
fields.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
